duties_responsibilities.duty: Conceptualize and implement innovative UI-related designs for the video game operating system.
Utilize in-depth understanding of the video game industry to develop designs resonating with the target audience.
Engage with leadership and development team to brainstorm new ideas and contribute to the vision.
Maintain and apply up-to-date knowledge of UI/UX best practices and design principles.
Provide regular updates and respond to feedback without the need for micromanagement.
Apply design to marketing assets, presentations, and design-adjacent tasks.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Design, UX, or a related field (Master's preferred)
